description.value: Note: Ignores Armour, but does no damage to Non-living targets, machines (Machine 5+ trait), and Daemons. Contact with psychic shields, wards, or untouchables disables the weapon for 1d10 days. One step easier to obtain if offered by a Stryxis Merchant.

system.notes: Ignores Armour, but does no damage to Non-living targets, machines (Machine 5+ trait), and Daemons. Contact with psychic shields, wards, or untouchables disables the weapon for 1d10 days. One step easier to obtain if offered by a Stryxis Merchant.
